note: The medication schedule indicates the amount of the Mango Grant and the date when it shall be disbursed. Please note that once you purchase the medication from the hospital pharmacy, you will need to upload the receipt here so we can track the progress of your treatment.
noteForEmptyData: The Medication Schedule will be available once the appointment for your first cycle is fixed by the doctor.
haveYouRecievedYourFirstMangoGrant: Have you received your first Mango Grant?
uploadNote: Note: Supported document format is pdf and image(png, jpg, jpeg), the maximum size to upload a document is 15MB
totalCostIncured: Total cumulative cost incurred by patient
